name.en: Case 1. Sensei Does not Dream of Bunny Akane
name.jp: Case 1. Sensei Does not Dream of Bunny Akane

desc.en: Upon seeing Akane's MomoTalk, Sensei arrives at the room Akane is staying in and knocks. Akane appears at that moment, apparently not expecting to see them. Bewildered, Sensei makes an urgent departure.
desc.jp: Upon seeing Akane's MomoTalk, Sensei arrives at the room Akane is staying in and knocks. Akane appears at that moment, apparently not expecting to see them. Bewildered, Sensei makes an urgent departure.
desc.zh_cn: 在MomoTalk表示有了新的想法的{cf朱音}，告诉老师有时间的时候到房间来一趟。等待着来访的老师的是穿着兔女郎服装的{cf朱音}。对微笑着说着兔女郎装也是为了服务而诞生的存在，所以希望用这副模样服务老师的{cf朱音}，领悟到自己将会社会性死亡的老师突然想起有急事而逃走了。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Tired and exhausted from trying to catch up on work, Sensei heads to the lounge. There they run into Akane, who asks if there's anything she can do to help, and she ends up lending a hand with cleaning. Afterwards, Akane asks if there's anything else she can do, but Sensei ends up falling asleep from exhaustion and Akane leaves quietly.
desc.jp: Tired and exhausted from trying to catch up on work, Sensei heads to the lounge. There they run into Akane, who asks if there's anything she can do to help, and she ends up lending a hand with cleaning. Afterwards, Akane asks if there's anything else she can do, but Sensei ends up falling asleep from exhaustion and Akane leaves quietly.
desc.zh_cn: 在结束与文档山的战斗的老师面前，打扮成兔女郎的{cf朱音}出现了。与询问是否需要什么服务的{cf朱音}一起进行了{et夏莱}的清扫。在打扫干净后，喝了{cf朱音}泡的茶，老师缓缓进入了梦乡。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

name.en: Case 1. Sensei Does not Dream of Bunny Akane
name.jp: Case 1. Sensei Does not Dream of Bunny Akane

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Sensei sets aside his backlog of work to take a walk downtown and runs into Akane. Akane is wearing an eye-catching bunny girl outfit, and a speechless Sensei urgently leaves the area with Akane in tow. To Sensei's shock, they end up taking refuge in a bunny girl cafe.
desc.jp: Sensei sets aside his backlog of work to take a walk downtown and runs into Akane. Akane is wearing an eye-catching bunny girl outfit, and a speechless Sensei urgently leaves the area with Akane in tow. To Sensei's shock, they end up taking refuge in a bunny girl cafe.
desc.zh_cn: 在市区散步时巧遇了穿着兔女郎服装的{cf朱音}。据本人所说，她一直在这里等着老师。为了躲避周围的视线而逃进的咖啡厅竟然是兔女郎主题的咖啡厅，{cf朱音}对老师的造诣之深相当感动。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

name.en: Case 4. Secretary Service Straight to You
name.jp: Case 4. Secretary Service Straight to You

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

name.en: Case 4. Secretary Service Straight to You
name.jp: Case 4. Secretary Service Straight to You

desc.en: While handling some overdue tasks at Schale, Sensei wishes aloud for some coffee and Akane suddenly appears, granting their wish. Sensei and Akane have a heart-to-heart, which helps Akane feel confident in herself again.
desc.jp: While handling some overdue tasks at Schale, Sensei wishes aloud for some coffee and Akane suddenly appears, granting their wish. Sensei and Akane have a heart-to-heart, which helps Akane feel confident in herself again.
desc.zh_cn: 工作到很晚的老师自言自语说要喝咖啡时，{cf朱音}递出了咖啡。尽管因为没想到她会在这里而感到惊慌，老师依然收下了咖啡，并向{cf朱音}询问最近一直打扮成兔女郎的理由。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

profile.en:
A C&C agent wearing a Bunny Girl costume as her disguise.

Even in unfamiliar environments, Akane keeps the team together, always in perfect uniform, and blazes their way forward with large amounts of C4. But she seems preoccupied lately... Maybe she's too excited about her new bunny outfit?
profile.jp:
ミレニアムサイエンススクール所属、潜入ミッションのためバニーガール姿へと着替えた「C&C」のエージェント。

不慣れな環境下でも、バニー服を率先して用意したり、C4を爆発させて障害物を片付けるなど、いつもと変わらず落ち着いて作戦を遂行する姿が見られる。普段とは違う服装に少し浮かれているのか、随所にウキウキした表情が垣間見えることも。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
千年科学学园所属，为了潜入任务而换上了兔女郎服的「C&C」特工。

在不熟悉的环境下仍率先准备了兔女郎服，引爆C4解决障碍物，和平时一样沉着冷静地执行作战。
也许是对与平时不同的服装感到兴奋，在哪都能看见她高兴的表情。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
千年科学学园所属，为了潜入任务而换上兔女郎服装的「C&C」特务。

即使身处陌生的环境，依然率先准备兔女郎服装、引爆C4清除障碍物，和平常一样沉着地运行作战。不知是不是因为穿着和平常不同的服装，随时都可以窥见兴奋的神情。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
千年科学学园所属，为了潜入任务而换上了兔女郎服的「C&C」特工。

在不熟悉的环境下仍率先准备了兔女郎服，引爆C4解决障碍物，和平时一样沉着冷静地执行作战。
也许是对与平时不同的服装感到兴奋，在哪都能看见她高兴的表情。

gacha.en: My Master's maid... Well, I guess I'm your rabbit now.
gacha.jp:
ご主人様のメイド……
いえ、今は
ご主人様のウサギ、と申しましょうか
gacha.zh_cn_jp:
主人的女仆……
不，现在
应该说是主人的兔子
gacha.zh_cn_tw:
我是主人的女仆……
不对，现在
应该说是主人的兔子吧
gacha.zh_cn_cn:
主人的女仆……
不，现在
应该说是主人的兔子

intro.en: I'm Akane, Master's maid... Or, I suppose I'm Master's pet bunny now!
intro.jp:
ご主人様のメイド、アカネです。
いえ…今はご主人様のウサギさん、
と申し上げるべきでしょうか？
intro.zh_cn_jp:
ご主人様のメイド、アカネです。
いえ…今はご主人様のウサギさん、
と申し上げるべきでしょうか？
intro.zh_cn_tw:
我是主人的女仆，朱音。
不对…现在是主人的兔子，
这样说比较对吗？

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: C&C and Sensei infiltrate the systems office to take control of the surveillance system, but old habits die hard, and they end up blowing it sky high.
desc.jp: C&C and Sensei infiltrate the systems office to take control of the surveillance system, but old habits die hard, and they end up blowing it sky high.
desc.zh_cn: 为掌控邮轮上的监视系统，老师和{cnC&C}本来打算占领中控室，然而本性难改的他们最后仍旧失手将中控室炸毁。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.jp:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.zh_cn:
为了捕捉{sn千年}的问题儿童「白兔」，{cnC&C}收到了出动的请求。
但她逃跑的目的地，竟然是{sn其他}学园的豪华邮轮！在有着奇怪规则的船上，{cnC&C}的全体成员必须换上兔女郎装……？

desc.en:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.jp:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.zh_cn:
为了捕捉{sn千年}的问题儿童「白兔」，{cnC&C}收到了出动的请求。
但她逃跑的目的地，竟然是{sn其他}学园的豪华邮轮！在有着奇怪规则的船上，{cnC&C}的全体成员必须换上兔女郎装……？

desc.en: C&C find themselves in a pickle after blowing up the systems office. Akane is beating herself up when Sensei proposes a Plan B.
desc.jp: C&C find themselves in a pickle after blowing up the systems office. Akane is beating herself up when Sensei proposes a Plan B.
desc.zh_cn: 由于失手炸毁中控室，{cnC&C}面临前所未见的危机，而{cf朱音}在自责的同时也向老师提议了一项B计划。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.zh_cn:
为了捕捉{sn千年}的问题儿童「白兔」，{cnC&C}收到了出动的请求。
但她逃跑的目的地，竟然是{sn其他}学园的豪华邮轮！在有着奇怪规则的船上，{cnC&C}的全体成员必须换上兔女郎装……？

desc.en:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.jp:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.zh_cn:
为了捕捉{sn千年}的问题儿童「白兔」，{cnC&C}收到了出动的请求。
但她逃跑的目的地，竟然是{sn其他}学园的豪华邮轮！在有着奇怪规则的船上，{cnC&C}的全体成员必须换上兔女郎装……？

desc.en: C&C wake up the kidnapped bunny girl and start interrogating her. Karin takes the lead, but the guard faints after being tickled for too long.
desc.jp: C&C wake up the kidnapped bunny girl and start interrogating her. Karin takes the lead, but the guard faints after being tickled for too long.
desc.zh_cn: {cnC&C}叫醒了先前胁持的兔女郎保镳，并尝试从她嘴里获取情报。{cf花凛}的拷问起初进行得相当顺利，直到最后那名兔女郎保镳因为承受不了持续的搔痒攻击而昏死过去。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.

desc.en:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.jp:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.zh_cn:
为了捕捉{sn千年}的问题儿童「白兔」，{cnC&C}收到了出动的请求。
但她逃跑的目的地，竟然是{sn其他}学园的豪华邮轮！在有着奇怪规则的船上，{cnC&C}的全体成员必须换上兔女郎装……？

desc.en: C&C busts onto the scene as usual when their best-laid plans fail. They spot White Rabbit and succeed in getting close to her but blow their cover at the last moment.
desc.jp: C&C busts onto the scene as usual when their best-laid plans fail. They spot White Rabbit and succeed in getting close to her but blow their cover at the last moment.
desc.zh_cn: 眼见她们事前拟定的计划一一失败，{cnC&C}只好采取老方法「正面对决」。就在老师和{cnC&C}成功找到白兔，而且快要接近她的时候，白兔还是发现了他们的存在。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Neru and Sensei are thrown into the ship's holding cell, and White Rabbit mocks them. Akane and Karin soon follow but also as prisoners.
desc.jp: Neru and Sensei are thrown into the ship's holding cell, and White Rabbit mocks them. Akane and Karin soon follow but also as prisoners.
desc.zh_cn: 见到{cf宁瑠}和老师被关进邮轮内的拘留所，白兔幸灾乐祸地嘲讽着两人。虽然{cf朱音}和{cf花凛}很快便来到拘留所，但大家后来才得知她们两人其实也同样是保镳被抓来的。

desc.en: White Rabbit is smug and triumphant as Neru's spirits are down. However, the tables turn when Asuna becomes a VIP, and C&C resumes its pursuit of White Rabbit.
desc.jp: White Rabbit is smug and triumphant as Neru's spirits are down. However, the tables turn when Asuna becomes a VIP, and C&C resumes its pursuit of White Rabbit.
desc.zh_cn: 就在{cf宁瑠}越来越沮丧，而白兔也越来越得意的时候，情势却突然有了一百八十度的大转变。由于{cf明日奈}摇身成为邮轮VIP，{cnC&C}的猎兔行动也再次展开。

desc.en: White Rabbit howls as Neru cheerfully hunts her down. Sensei and the other members stand by silently as they watch the scene.
desc.jp: White Rabbit howls as Neru cheerfully hunts her down. Sensei and the other members stand by silently as they watch the scene.
desc.zh_cn: 在老师和其他{cnC&C}成员的默许之下，{cf宁瑠}像只喜欢戏弄猎物的猎犬一样，兴奋地追着不停哭喊求饶的白兔。

desc.en: White Rabbit attempts to escape the ship on a drone but is sniped down by Karin and finally arrested. C&C has completed another mission, albeit roughly and messily.
desc.jp: White Rabbit attempts to escape the ship on a drone but is sniped down by Karin and finally arrested. C&C has completed another mission, albeit roughly and messily.
desc.zh_cn: 白兔原本打算搭乘停放在邮轮顶层的无人机逃离，但是由于无人机被{cf花凛}击落，因此最终她还是被{cnC&C}逮回了{sn千年}学园。就这样，{cnC&C}又再次顺利地完成了一项任务，并且为{cn研讨会}留下了一大堆烂摊子。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.jp:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.zh_cn:
为了捕捉{sn千年}的问题儿童「白兔」，{cnC&C}收到了出动的请求。
但她逃跑的目的地，竟然是{sn其他}学园的豪华邮轮！在有着奇怪规则的船上，{cnC&C}的全体成员必须换上兔女郎装……？

desc.en:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.jp:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.zh_cn:
为了捕捉{sn千年}的问题儿童「白兔」，{cnC&C}收到了出动的请求。
但她逃跑的目的地，竟然是{sn其他}学园的豪华邮轮！在有着奇怪规则的船上，{cnC&C}的全体成员必须换上兔女郎装……？

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。
